```{css echo=FALSE}
.cv-download-section {

}

    padding-bottom: 129%;

    overflow: hidden;
    max-width: 100%;
}

.embed-container iframe {
    position: absolute;
    top: 0;
    left: 0;
    width: 100%;
    height: 100%;
    border: 1px solid #dee2e6;
    border-radius: 4px;
}

@media (max-width: 768px) {
    .embed-container {
        display: none;
    }
}
```
